properties.Title: Nikli
properties.Story: PSDI has well over 40+ schools called Child Development Centers in high risk areas. These are fully funded free schools where we provide Children with nutrition. This gives parents incentive to send their children to schools in the first place. Usually parents in such situation are forced to send their children to work or beg by the time they are 8-10 years old. Currently our schools are structured in a way that only 4000$ is enough to fully support the schools for two full years.

properties.Title: Dhunot
properties.Story: PSDI also established a small clinic in Bogra. Currently due to lack of funding, the clinic was forced to be closed temporarily. With some funding we can get it open and running.

properties.Title: Nadigram
properties.Story: We have provided hundreds and thousands of saplings since our inception in the Eighties to women like Gaziur and Salma who are then incentivized to take care of these saplings till they mature. On average it takes 10-15 years for these trees to fully grow. Meanwhile it gives multiple benefits. For example, the roots help strengthens the roadside and the weak soil around rivers. The women can also utilize the fruits from these trees. Then the trees are cut down for wood and a significant portion of the income goes directly to the families who took care of those trees, making the entire community self-sufficient on multiple levels and providing an economic boost for the community.

properties.Summary: Tree nursery and roadside plantation in Sherpur, Bogra

properties.Title: Mendni
properties.Story: There are currently two small garments factories in the Unions of Nari and Medni in the district of Netrokona, where we teach women the necessary skills. They make clothes for themselves, their communities and we are currently trying to sell these garments and other handicrafts in developed nations like ours. This would give them a huge economic boost.
properties.Summary: Two Small Garment Factories in the Nari and Medni areas in the Netrokona district

properties.Title: Hospital Netrokona
properties.Story: We collaborated with many organizations to open a small hospital in Netrokona, Netrokona. This hospital is in an area where people had to travel hundreds of Kilometers to find just a government clinic with basic amenities. The lack of accessibility combined with illiteracy and superstition forced people to seek help from spiritual healers and Quacks. The Habiganj Bazaar Rural Hospital has been instrumental in providing access to healthcare, and our social workers help encourage people to seek real medical attention from certified professionals.
